createApplication(application, options, callback)

Creates a new Application object.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
application Object

The Application object to create.
options Object <optional>

Options.
callback createApplicationCallback

The callback that handles the response.

Client.js

on(string, listener)

Adds a listener to the end of the listeners array for the specified event. No checks are made to see if the listener has already been added. Multiple calls passing the same combination of event and listener will result in the listener being added multiple times.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
string

event - Name of event to listen on.
listener onListenerCallback

Function to call when event is emitted.
Source:
Client.js
